document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">Silken </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Speech, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Specious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Shoe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Traitor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Bee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">Service </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">newest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Grace </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Present </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">continually </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">Suit, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Chance </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">His </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Troth, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Term </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Protracted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Breeze </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Continual </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Ban </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">propoundeth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Continual </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Divorce </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Of silken speech and specious shoe
